title: Mini Boss Data
description: Information on mini bosses that provides metadata and other related information, such as source files and animations

name.description: The display name of this mini boss.

src.description: The source paths to the files needed to load the mini boss.

skins.description: The list of skins needed to fully create the mini boss correctly (in normal form).

backSkins.description: The list of skins needed to fully create the mini boss correctly (in normal form facing the back).

upgradedSkins.description: The list of skins needed to fully create the mini boss correctly (in upgraded form).

backUpgradedSkins.description: The list of skins needed to fully create the mini boss correctly (in upgraded form facing the back).

animation.description: The default animation it should play when this form is loaded.
